question: What is the name of the autobiography of Mahatma Gandhi?
option3: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
option4: The Story of My Life as a Lawyer
answer: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
explanation: The name of the autobiography of Mahatma Gandhi is "The Story of My Experiments with Truth". From the year 1925 to 1929 he published it in his journal Navjivan. The english translation of this autobiography was published in the journal "Young India".
